artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson

description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of two belt buckles on the left; in the center a woman in a light purple and pink gown with a pink fan and a hat with pink flowers and green foliage; on the right a woman in a white and purple gown with a hat with rows of pink ribbon/detailing
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Trente-cinquième Cahier, 30 Octobre 1788
